<p>Colleen's first week at a new AI consulting contract is off to a great start. She's building automations for marketing ops and customer success, self-hosted n8n on Hetzner to cut costs, and got her YouTube shorts roasted by her 12-year-old. Joe sent two contracts, wrote a flagship mobile framework comparison article, and learned some lessons from his first round of cold outbound emails.</p><p></p><p><b>Chapters</b></p><ul><li>00:00 Olympics and Curling</li><li>05:50 Customer Success and AI</li><li>11:09 Workflow Automation and Cost Reduction</li><li>17:05 Selling AI Automations</li><li>28:04 YouTube Shorts and Content Creation</li><li>56:09 Upcoming Solo Trip and Secret Project Teaser</li></ul>
